00003  *
00004  * controlls
00005  *
00006  * created with FontCreator
00007  * written by F. Maximilian Thiele
00008  *
00009  * http://www.apetech.de/fontCreator
00010  * me@apetech.de
00011  *
00012  * File Name           : controlls.h
00013  * Date                : 06.05.2007
00014  * Font size in bytes  : 349
00015  * Font width          : 8
00016  * Font height         : 8
00017  * Font first char     : 48
00018  * Font last char      : 55
00019  * Font used chars     : 7
00020  *
00021  * The font data are defined as
00022  *
00023  * struct _FONT_ {
00024  *     uint16_t   font_Size_in_Bytes_over_all_included_Size_it_self;
00025  *     uint8_t    font_Width_in_Pixel_for_fixed_drawing;
00026  *     uint8_t    font_Height_in_Pixel_for_all_characters;
00027  *     unit8_t    font_First_Char;
00028  *     uint8_t    font_Char_Count;
00029  *
00030  *     uint8_t    font_Char_Widths[font_Last_Char - font_First_Char +1];
00031  *                  // for each character the separate width in pixels,
00032  *                  // characters < 128 have an implicit virtual right empty row
00033  *
00034  *     uint8_t    font_data[];
00035  *                  // bit field of all characters
00036  */
00037 
00038 #include <inttypes.h>
00039

00041 #define CONTROLLS_H
00042 
00043 #define CONTROLLS_WIDTH 8
00044 #define CONTROLLS_HEIGHT 8
00045 
00046 static const uint8_t Controlls[] = { 0x01, 0x5D, // size
00047                 0x08, // width
00048                 0x08, // height
00049                 0x30, // first char
00050                 0x07, // char count
00051 
00052                 // char widths
00053                 0x06, 0x06, 0x06, 0x06, 0x06, 0x06, 0x06,
00054 
00055                 // font data
00056                 0x0C, 0x06, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x06, 0x0C, // 48
00057                 0x30, 0x60, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x60, 0x30, // 49
00058                 0xFE, 0x82, 0x83, 0x83, 0x82, 0xFE, // 50
00059                 0x00, 0x78, 0x78, 0x78, 0x78, 0x00, // 51
00060                 0x00, 0x70, 0x70, 0x70, 0x70, 0x00, // 52
00061                 0x00, 0x60, 0x60, 0x60, 0x60, 0x00, // 53
00062                 0x00, 0x40, 0x40, 0x40, 0x40, 0x00 // 54
00063 
00064                 };
